version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="editpatient"> <editpatient id="5" name="Edit Client"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <date/> <motechId/> <firstName/> <middleName/> <lastName/> <preferredName/> <phoneNumber/> <phoneOwnership/> <nhis/> <nhisExpires/> <mothersMotechId/> <edd/> <stopEnrollment/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> <formname>editPatient-jf</formname> </editpatient> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/editpatient/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/editpatient/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/editpatient/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="motechId" nodeset="/editpatient/motechId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="firstName" nodeset="/editpatient/firstName" required="false()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="middleName" nodeset="/editpatient/middleName" required="false()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="lastName" nodeset="/editpatient/lastName" required="false()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="preferredName" nodeset="/editpatient/preferredName" required="false()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="phoneNumber" nodeset="/editpatient/phoneNumber" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="phoneOwnership" nodeset="/editpatient/phoneOwnership" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="nhis" nodeset="/editpatient/nhis" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="nhisExpires" nodeset="/editpatient/nhisExpires" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="mothersMotechId" nodeset="/editpatient/mothersMotechId" type="xsd:int" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long"/> <xf:bind id="edd" nodeset="/editpatient/edd" required="false()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind id="stopEnrollment" nodeset="/editpatient/stopEnrollment" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/editpatient/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/editpatient/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page8</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="firstName"> <xf:label>First Name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="middleName"> <xf:label>Middle Name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="lastName"> <xf:label>Last Name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="preferredName"> <xf:label>Preferred Name</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="phoneNumber"> <xf:label>Phone number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="phoneOwnership"> <xf:label>Phone Ownership?</xf:label> <xf:item id="PERSONAL"> <xf:label>Personal phone</xf:label> <xf:value>PERSONAL</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="HOUSEHOLD"> <xf:label>Owned by household</xf:label> <xf:value>HOUSEHOLD</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="PUBLIC"> <xf:label>Public phone</xf:label> <xf:value>PUBLIC</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="nhis"> <xf:label>NHIS Number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="nhisExpires"> <xf:label>NHIS expiry date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="mothersMotechId"> <xf:label>Mother's MoTeCH ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="edd"> <xf:label>Expected Delivery Date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="stopEnrollment"> <xf:label>Stop enrollment</xf:label> <xf:item id="Y"> <xf:label>Yes</xf:label> <xf:value>Y</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="N"> <xf:label>No</xf:label> <xf:value>N</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="formtype"> <xf:label>formType</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="formname"> <xf:label>formName</xf:label> </xf:input> </xf:group> </xf:xforms>
